item.title: Help debug Smart Connections issues
item.description: The steps necessary to help me debug an issue at start-up. make sure this setting in Obsidian is toggled on open the developer console logs (on windows: CTRL+SHIFT+i) Clear the logs: Disable & Re-enable Smart Connections Screenshot errors in the logs and send them to me for review.

item.title: Creating a Custom GPT with Smart Connect
item.description: This guide will help you create a custom GPT assistant that interacts with your Obsidian vault using the Smart Connect plugin. Preparation: Obsidian & Smart Connect: Ensure you have Obsidian and the Smart Connect plugin installed and set up.

item.title: Elevate Your Obsidian Experience with Smart Connections
